plot: Pablo is going to an important business meeting. Absent-minded and talking on the phone, he realises that he has lost his way. The car engine stops. From there on, nothing will be the same for him.
title: Tránsito
plot_es: Pablo is going to an important business meeting. Absent-minded and talking on the phone, he realises that he has lost his way. The car engine stops. From there on, nothing will be the same for him.
plot_en: Pablo is going to an important business meeting. Absent-minded and talking on the phone, he realises that he has lost his way. The car engine stops. From there on, nothing will be the same for him.
